trans-unit.source: When a script reference is rendered, the ScriptReferenceEventArgs object contains the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> object that is defined in the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> instance.
trans-unit.target: Quando viene eseguito il rendering di un riferimento a script, l'oggetto ScriptReferenceEventArgs contiene il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>oggetto definito nel <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager>istanza.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>

trans-unit.source: You can create an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference> event to check the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> object and modify it as needed.
trans-unit.target: È possibile creare un gestore eventi per il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference>eventi per controllare il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>dell'oggetto e modificarlo in base alle esigenze.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReferenceEventArgs"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref> object that contains the client script referenced on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"> </xref> oggetto che contiene lo script client a cui fa riferimento nella pagina Web.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref> object that contains the script library.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"> </xref> oggetto che contiene la raccolta di script.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference> object in the Script property is added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts%2A> property when the <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>oggetto nella proprietà Script viene aggiunto al <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts%2A>proprietà quando il <xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference>viene generato l'evento.</xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.ResolveScriptReference> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptManager.Scripts%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.ScriptReference>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"></xref> object that contains the client script referenced on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptReference"> </xref> oggetto che contiene lo script client a cui fa riferimento nella pagina Web.
